item.title: Version 1.2.16 (Build 20251226)
item.description:
What's New

Fix spell check restore bug when undoing standalone 'ư' to 'w'

  • Fixed issue where typing 'w + w + i + t + h' + space would restore as 'wwith' instead of 'with'
  • Root cause: When undoing standalone char 'ư' → 'w', stateIndex wasn't decremented
  • Solution: Decrease stateIndex by 1 when processing standalone KEY_U undo in insertW()
  • This ensures keyStates correctly reflects the actual typed characters after undo
  • Bump version to 20251226
